value.0:
Introduction to Potion Brewing:

By placing an empty bottle and an ingredient into the crafting box, certain base potions can be created. This action requires the Brew Potion feat. More complex recipes can be completed by adding another component to an existing potion. All potions have a gold cost and coins are expended directly into the crafting box during the process.

The following are several potion recipes known and taught in the area around Brost.

Empty Bottle and Bit of Holy Parchment: Oil of Shield of Faith

Empty Bottle and Egg Shell: Potion of Bless

Empty Bottle and Horse Hair: Potion of Endure Elements

Empty Bottle and Multicolored Sand: Potion of Mage Armor

Empty Bottle and Nut Shells: Potion of Aid

Empty Bottle and Pork Rind: Potion of Ultravision

Empty Bottle and Powdered Silver: Potion of Protection from Evil

Empty Bottle and Eagle Feathers: Potion of Cure Light Wounds

Empty Bottle and Rose Petals: Potion of Resistance

Potion of Aid and Bull's Hair: Potion of Bull's Strength

Potion of Aid and Cat's Fur: Potion of Cat's Grace

Potion of Aid and Eagle Feathers: Potion of Eagle Splendor

Potion of Aid and Fox Hairs: Potion of Fox's Cunning

Potion of Aid and Lime in Water: Potion of Remove Blindness/Deafness

Potion of Aid and Owl Feathers: Potion of Owl's Wisdom

Potion of Aid and Pork Rind: Potion of Endurance

Potion of Aid and Powdered Rhubarb and Adder Stomach: Potion of Lesser Restoration

Additional combinations are known to exist and experimentation is possible.
